title: all: dubious looking panic
body:
I just saw this panic in 672069179b80 tip.

It doesn't look possible, which makes me suspect
a compiler or runtime bug.

The line it's panicking on is the second line of:

	for width := 0; len(s) > 0; s = s[width:] {
		r := rune(s[0])


panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x1 pc=0x49c163]

goroutine 2633 [running]:
